website_summaries.verdict: Broken modes, both online and off, bring the otherwise enjoyable Sonic  &  All-Stars Racing Transformed to a screeching halt.
pros: Controlling the crazy vehicles feels greatCreative and varied track design that changes mid-raceTransformed vehicles feel significantly different
cons: Certain modes and challenges are completely broken Can feel slow at times when not boostingDanica Patrick is out of place

customer_reviews.title: The best $12 game ever
customer_reviews.text: I was reading reviews on the latest Sonic racing game on the Switch, and saw a few reviewers that said this game was way better. I've owned a Wii U since it came out and had never heard of this game (which is surprising because the Wii U doesn't have a ton of good games). So far, it has been a blast. The only thing I don't like is that it forces one of the two players onto the Gamepad, it doesn't allow split screen for the 2 players. This is a quite deep game with a lot more variability than Mario Kart. The campaign experience is a major differentiator from that series.

customer_reviews.title: Fun family racing game!
customer_reviews.text: Good, fun family racing game that fills the void of no MarioKart for the WiiU. It's by no means a knock-off, though. The transformations from land to sea to air are fun and good track design means that we'll still play this even when MarioKart comes out.
customer_reviews.author: BRR

customer_reviews.title: FUN for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old can play this game...and I think that is great! We have a lot of fun playing together when we can't get out of the house. My wife likes it, too. A win for the home team!
customer_reviews.author: yawansumame

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game
customer_reviews.text: I initially wanted to purchase this game just because of it's price point and wanted to have my racing fix on Wii U. After playing, I have to say I was happily surprised. At $40 this game is a steal. Great gameplay, visuals, music, and characters. This is more than just a placeholder until the next Mario Kart, it stands on it's own very well and it won't be put to the side when that next MK does roll out.
customer_reviews.author: OoAK

product_meta.title: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed (Nintendo Selects) - Nintendo Wii U
product_meta.description:
Platform:Nintendo Wii USonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. Master your driving skills as you drift, barrel roll and boost to overtake your rivals, or use your weapons tactically and unleash your All-Star move to gain the winning advantage. 

It's not just your fellow racers you need to watch out for: as the road falls away beneath you, or the river runs dry, new routes emerge and your vehicle transforms to take advantage of the terrain. Discover alternative routes and short cuts as you perfect the course in this adrenaline fuelled dash to the finish line - racing will never be the same again.
feature_bullets: This is no ordinary race. Each character is equipped with their own unique vehicle that can transform into a car, boat and plane to take advantage of the changing terrains.
Take to land, sea & air as you race through 16 dynamically changing courses inspired by SEGA's illustrious gaming history.
Race as one of the 20+ legendary All-Stars. The starting line-up has been transformed as new iconic characters from the world of SEGA join the race.
Utilize an arsenal of devastating weapons which require skill to aim, shoot, evade and block.
